general.gigTitle: develop custom CRM, laravel PHP website for application

sellerCard.oneLiner: Specialises In Custom CRM And PHP Websites
sellerCard.description: As a dedicated CRM development specialist, I bring a wealth of expertise to web projects, CRM portals, and lead management. With a strong command of web-based technologies, database languages, and JavaScript frameworks, I excel in creating dynamic and efficient CRM solutions. My experience spans applications and solutions tailored for enterprises, government agencies, private businesses, and nonprofit organizations. Committed to meeting deadlines, I consistently deliver standout CRM solutions, ensuring clients benefit from cutting-edge and customized customer relationship management.

description.content:
Are you seeking a tailored solution to streamline your business operations? Look no further! With my expertise in Web Development, I offer bespoke services to develop a Custom CRM system and Laravel PHP Website tailored specifically for your management needs.


Whether you require a robust CRM to efficiently manage your leads and sales pipeline or a dynamic PHP Website built on the Laravel framework, I have the skills and experience to bring your vision to life. As a developer specializing in Custom Website solutions, I understand the importance of creating tailored systems that align perfectly with your business objectives.


By leveraging the latest technologies and best practices in Custom CRM development and Laravel PHP Website creation, I ensure that your system is not only user-friendly but also scalable and efficient. From initial concept to final implementation, I am committed to delivering high-quality solutions that empower your business to thrive in today's competitive landscape.


Let's collaborate to transform your ideas into reality. Contact me today to discuss your Custom CRM and PHP Website development needs, and let's embark on this journey together toward success!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide before development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In order to start development, the first phase is requirements gathering, If you do have already an SRS document, please provide it so the process goes smoothly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I receive a demo link for checking the modules?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Of course, the demo link will be provided when the development phase starts right away.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I've to purchase hosting for CRM or Portal
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, In order the make the portal online, the hosting will need to be purchased.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I still received Bug Fixes after order completion
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Bugs will be fixed after order completion for a limited time for no extra cost, No extra feature will be added.

packageList.title: Basic

reviews.comment: Working with Shuaib was an absolute pleasure. There are so many things that can go wrong when working with a new provider and none of them happened with Shoaib. He was careful to review documentation, provided feedback and ideas, and generally made sure that the app was solid and to spec. Our client is thrilled with the end result and so are we! I would highly recommend Shoaib to anyone needing a skilled back end developer with a great attitude. Thank you Shoaib!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the great feedback! It was a pleasure working with you, and I appreciate the clear communication and collaboration. I'm glad your client is happy, and I look forward to working together again!

reviews.comment:
I've had the pleasure of working with Shualb, and I can confidently say they are an exceptional developer. Their technical skills, attention to detail, and problem-solving abilities have been invaluable to our project.

Not only do they deliver high-quality work, but they also communicate clearly, meet deadlines, and go the extra mile to ensure everything runs smoothly. Whether it’s troubleshooting complex issues or implementing new features, they always approach tasks with professionalism and efficiency.

I highly recommend Shualb to anyone looking for a skilled and reliable developer. Looking forward to working together again in the future!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you. I appreciate your clear communication and look forward to collaborating again in the future!

reviews.comment: I'm really enjoying working with Shoaib on this project. His attention to detail is excellent and I'm very happy with the progress so far! Looking forward to the next milestone!

Shoaib was a wonderful surprise. He helped me with the creation of the MVP and starting just from some frames of UX was able to build the CMS properly and on time. He also took ownership of the server side and publication. Working with him was easy and smooth. For sure will reach out for future implementations and new projects.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your appreciation. I hope we work together for a long time.

reviews.comment: Responds very fast, always here for questions and has flexibility for different demands
